content: **this is for a pdf pattern only this is purchased on ko-fi and will not show up in your library please be aware when you purchase that the email you use to purchase will be where the pattern will be sent by ko-fi** i ve created this step by step written pattern- complete with photos tips tricks and helpful links- 8 info packed pages images of the pieces created and links to basics and stitches american terms difficulty comfortable beginner comfortable with row and round changes increasing and decreasing single_crochet and picot stitches yarns i used i used lion brand pound of love medium 4 weight in olive a piece of scrap yarn in black for eyes any yarn will work as long as hook size does not leave gaps in the stitches when in doubt size down ***** a note on yarns***** almost all of the yarns i use in my stash has been given to me so they vary widely however i suggest the same weight and if possible the same brand if you are buying new skeins of at least 3 5 oz of each color this ensures that each piece will match in size and shape as medium weight can vary from brand to brand colors needed for pieces i use one color but use what inspires you recommended hook size 3 25 mm used in pattern or 3 5 mm- if you have gaps in the stitches i suggest going a hook size smaller supplies yarn yarn needle fiber filling scissors crochet hook scrap of black yarn for eyes scrap yarn or stitch markers pieces are worked flat some sewing required
